ValidationRule.description: When Opp is moved to Order In Process ensure that the territory hierarchy of the end user Account/Current Opp is populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Commit"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Order in Process"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won")), Auto_Renewal_Eligible_Core__c = FALSE, NOT(TEXT(Business_Group__c)= "MSP" && SBQQ__RenewedContract__c <> NULL), ISBLANK(Territory_ID__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To move this Opportunity to Order In Process, please open an internal ticket to populate the complete territory hierarchy
